alert.note: Alert for Dubois; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 29 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM CDT THURSDAY... The officials at the Indiana Department of Environmental Management have called for an Ozone action day on Thursday, June 30th for the following counties...in effect until 11 PM CDT this evening... ...Air Quality Alert in effect from 8 AM to 11 PM CDT Thursday. Dubois Perry Here are some recommended actions that the public can take to reduce ozone forming emissions: * Walk, bike, carpool or use public transportation. * Avoid using the drive-through and combine errands into one trip. * Avoid refueling your vehicle or using gasoline-powered lawn equipment until after 7 PM. * Turn off your engine when idling for more than 30 seconds. * Conserve energy by turning off lights or setting the air conditioner to 75 degrees or above.
